text: Abo nibo bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’ukuba kingira kutaja mungoro y’Imana ntagatifu, batako baba zitirira kuri zantungwa zanyu ntizishike aho zagenewe gushika, rero iyo hataba abagabo baba isilamu hamwe naba Isilamu kazi ata bumenyi bafise kugira ngo ntimuba honyange namwe mutabazi no kuri ivyo vyose mugaca mufatwa n’umubabaro kuribo kugira ngo Imana yinjize mw’ijuru uwo yishakiye mubwami bwayo, rero iyo bacanamwo ntankeka twari kubahana bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri muribo hamwe n’ibihano bibabaza cane
